keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Naval engineers are working to develop technology like self-driving cars that can clear the way for a convoy full of troops. But in field tests, the autonomous future still seems far away.

headline.main: Navy Robots Test the Limits of Autonomy
